name: pair Networks
overview:
Launched in January 1996, and profitable since its second month of operation, pair Networks provides a range of Web hosting options to businesses, bloggers, artists, musicians, educational institutions, and non-profit organizations around the World.

pair Networks is well-managed, consistently profitable, and one of the world leaders in its industry.

As of August 1, 2007, all of pair Networks’ operations, including datacenters, support operations, administrative facilities, and employee commutes & business travel are Carbon Neutral. pair Networks is committed to setting the standard for sustainable business practices in their industry.

In addition to standard Web hosting (pair.com), pair Networks offers fully managed dedicated servers (QuickServe.com), virtual private servers (pairVPS.com), co-location services (pairColo.com), e-commerce hosting (pairCommerce.com), Web hosting for hobbyists (pairLite.com), and domain name registration services (pairNIC.com).

To learn more about pair Networks, visit:

http://www.pair.com
